metadata.description: The location of this regional hub. All resources, including spoke resources, will be deployed to this region. This region must support availability zones.

Set to true to include a basic VPN Gateway deployment into the hub. Set to false to leave network space for a VPN Gateway, but do not deploy one. Default is false. Note deploying VPN gateways can take significant time.
Set to true to include one Windows and one Linux virtual machine for you to experience peering, gateway transit, and bastion access. Default is false.

Username for both the Linux and Windows VM. Must only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores and may not start with a hyphen or number. Only needed when providing deployVirtualMachines=true.

Password for both the Linux and Windows VM. Password must have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character. Must be at least 12 characters. Only needed when providing deployVirtualMachines=true.

rules.name: DNS
rules.description: Allow DNS outbound (for simplicity, adjust as needed)

ruleCollections.name: org-wide-allowed
ruleCollections.rules: [if(parameters('deployVirtualMachines'), createArray(createObject('ruleType', 'ApplicationRule', 'name', 'WindowsVirtualMachineHealth', 'description', 'Supports Windows Updates and Windows Diagnostics', 'fqdnTags', createArray('WindowsDiagnostics', 'WindowsUpdate'), 'protocols', createArray(createObject('protocolType', 'Https', 'port', 443)), 'sourceAddresses', createArray('10.200.0.0/24'))), createArray())]

metadata.description: This Log Analyics Workspace stores logs from the regional hub network, its spokes, and other related resources. Workspaces are regional resource, as such there would be one workspace per hub (region)

properties.description: Allow our users in. Update this to be as restrictive as possible.
Service Requirement. Allow control plane access. Regional Tag not yet supported.
Service Requirement. Allow Required Host to Host Communication.
Allow SSH out to the virtual network
Allow RDP out to the virtual network
Required for control plane outbound. Regional prefix not yet supported
Service Requirement. Allow Required Host to Host Communication.
Service Requirement. Allow Required Session and Certificate Validation.

metadata.description: The NSG around the Azure Bastion subnet. Source: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/bastion/bastion-nsg
The regional hub network.
Azure Firewall Policy
This is the regional Azure Firewall that all regional spoke networks can egress through.
The public IP for the regional hub's Azure Bastion service.
This regional hub's Azure Bastion service. NSGs are configured to allow Bastion to reach any resource subnet in peered spokes.
The public IPs for the regional VPN gateway. Only deployed if requested.
The is the regional VPN gateway, configured with basic settings. Only deployed if requested.
Next hop to the regional hub's Azure Firewall
NSG on the resource subnet (just using a common one for all as an example, but usually would be based on the specific needs of the spoke).
NSG on the Private Link subnet (just using a common one for all as an example, but usually would be based on the specific needs of the spoke).
The private Network Interface Card for the linux VM in spoke one.
A basic Linux virtual machine that will be attached to spoke one.
The private Network Interface Card for the Windows VM in spoke two.
A basic Windows virtual machine that will be attached to spoke two.
